About

This is a mirror of https://film-storyboards.tmblr.com

Film Storyboards provides with previz, production design and visual storytelling services for film, animation, advertising and cross-media projects.

This blog shows preparatory drawings, rough sketches, storyboards and concept illustrations accumulated in the drawers over the years.

You can navigate the blog using tags on the right side menu. You can navigate from one post to another using your keyboard arrows.

All works by Yves Capelle / alternatyves outc. / Film Storyboards, unless stated otherwise.

Read more.

See Film Storyboards portfolio for more or Scénarimages if you préfère en français.

Credits: IMDb
